sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The portmap package contains portmap, pmap_dump and pmap_set.

sect3.title: portmap
sect3.para: portmap is the rpc port mapper.

sect3.title: pmap_dump
sect3.para: pmap_dump saves the port mapping table to an ascii file.

sect3.title: pmap_set
sect3.para: pmap_set restores the port mapping table from an ascii file.
